sentence: The rooms were stunning very modern with the usual facilities and a nespreso coffee machine
On the up excellent al fresco room and excellent service from the reception when they were plainly experiencing system failure
A superb hotel for location facilities service luxury and comfort I really love this hotel in the heart of Manchester it has everything you need for a most enjoyable stay
Excellent greeting from all the staff at the hotel from concierge to reception could not be more helpful
All the rooms have been spotlessly clean with great facilities
The events staff reception concierge team house keeping waiting on staff all delivered their services to a very high level
Spa and gym very godBreakfasts excellent
Wonderful fantastic excellent clean spacious etc ” We were going to see a concert at Albert Hall so didn
Staff very attentive friendly professional even the decorator called the lift for us
From the glass opening at the front the friendly reception area and staff the card activated lifts and the hallways the hotel was already amazing
There was a huge wedding on and we could not move in the foyer
Great hotel but did not make use of leisure facilities as we ran out of time

The reception area is lovely and some fantastic staff however the pool area is 3 star cold jacuzi steam room with not a lot of steam and just lacking any kind of luxury gym is not worth using tiny and no equipment
All amenities expected of a 4 5 star hotel
When they arrived one of my colleagues was told that they did not have a I booked this accommodation for work colleagues
It had all the usual amenities you would expect
Over all I probably would not stay here again it was a lovely hotel the decor in the reception area was amazing but for the price I felt we could of stayed somewhere much nicer
Upon arrival at the hotel I accidentally entered the bar instead of reception but was guided to the reception with absolute friendliness
The spa and gym is well laid out with a dedicated lift if you want to go do an in your robe provided for free but £ 95 to take home slippers provided for free
The reception bar restaurant areas of the Radison blu have recently been refurbished to a high standard
There was so much noise in reception from refurbishment AND the room was not ready until 430pm so Vicky who checked us in was very flustered

Crowne Plaza oxford road Around 11 pm we went to collect our bags from the concierge and having heard jo more were going to get a cab to the other hotel but quite clearly the hotel was back up and running or though we had n’t been advised so We went to reception and tried to check in and were told we could

Great location for the conference venue but unfortunately the spa facilities were not in action and despite the high price and upgrade given the amenities in the room were fairly basic compared to comparable hotels

Location no alcohol in rom quick elevators healthy drinks and sweets in lobyNote they first put me in “ accessible ” room for disabled they changed it quickly when we asked which I highly apreciate I hated rooms that shine even with shutter light comes bright to the rom noise they are drilling while people are sleping towels and bed sheets are not changed very limited options in breakfast pricey and not up to standard
Lift service to the upper floors where I was staying was fairly slow the only thing I could think of
No biscuits with the tea making facilities
Electronic door entry system repeatedly deactivated requiring a trip to reception on each occasion
Room lovely staff were rude at reception but worst of all is a 5 star hotel with no proper residents bar
Our room key kept failing which meant trips back to reception every time
Seems a shame when they have eliminated the use of plastics for cups and for single use toiletries
